Class ResultsController

java.lang.Object
MVC.controller.ResultsController
public class ResultsController extends Object
Controller for the results view in the Visa Application Processing Simulator. Handles loading, displaying, and analyzing simulation run results, including charts, tables, and bottleneck detection. Integrates with the DAO for data access and updates the UI using JavaFX components.

Features:

  • Loads simulation runs and their results from the database
  • Displays run details, service point metrics, and bottleneck info
  • Provides interactive charts for analysis (bar, scatter, distribution)
  • Supports filtering and comparison by distribution type and metric
  • Handles run selection, deletion, and navigation
